Package A4

Class BookList

java.lang.Object
A4.BookList
public class BookList extends Object
The BookList class defines the BookList method which holds Book objects in a linked circular list. It also defines methods used to change the list and add books.
Author:
Natha

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookList()
    The BookList default constructor initializes the head variable of a BookList object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToStart(Book b)
    The addToStart method adds a new Node at the front of a linked list which holds the book object passed in the method.
    void
    commit()
    The commit method outputs all books in the BookList into the "Update_Books.txt" file.
    boolean
    delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords()
    The delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords method deletes duplicate consecutive Book objects in the list.
    void
    displayContent()
    The displayContent method prints the Book entries in the list on the console.
    BookList
    extractAuthList(String aut)
    The extractAuthList method takes an author string, finds all Book entries with the same author, and gives a list of the authors
    A4.BookList.Node
    getTail()
    the getTail method returns the Node at the end of a linked list.
    boolean
    insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
    the insertBefore method takes an ISBN value and inserts a Book object before the book which matches the ISBN value.
    boolean
    insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
    The insertBetween takes 2 ISBN values and inserts a Book object between 2 books that match the ISBN values.
    BookList
    reverseList()
    The reverseList method reverses the book list.
    int
    size()
    The size method gives the length of the BookList.
    void
    storeRecordByYear(int yr)
    The storeRecordByYear method takes a year and writes all book entries with the same year in a new file.
    boolean
    swap(long isbn1, long isbn2)
    The swap method takes 2 ISBN values and swaps the books in the list which correspond to the ISBNs given.

      public BookList()
      The BookList default constructor initializes the head variable of a BookList object

  • Method Details

    • addToStart

      public void addToStart(Book b)
      The addToStart method adds a new Node at the front of a linked list which holds the book object passed in the method.
      Parameters:
      b - is the book object to be added to the front of the list.

    • getTail

      public A4.BookList.Node getTail()
      the getTail method returns the Node at the end of a linked list.
      Returns:
      gives the Node at the end of the list.

    • storeRecordByYear

      public void storeRecordByYear(int yr)
      The storeRecordByYear method takes a year and writes all book entries with the same year in a new file.
      Parameters:
      yr - is the publishing year of books to be stored.

    • insertBefore

      public boolean insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
      the insertBefore method takes an ISBN value and inserts a Book object before the book which matches the ISBN value.
      Parameters:
      isbn - is a Long value which represents the ISBN of a book entry to find.
      b - is the Book object to be added.
      Returns:
      confirms whether or not the insert was successful.

    • insertBetween

      public boolean insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
      The insertBetween takes 2 ISBN values and inserts a Book object between 2 books that match the ISBN values.
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - is the first ISBN value.
      isbn2 - is the second ISBN value.
      b - is the Book object to insert.
      Returns:
      confirms whether or not the insert was successful.

    • displayContent

      public void displayContent()
      The displayContent method prints the Book entries in the list on the console.

    • delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords

      public boolean delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords()
      The delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords method deletes duplicate consecutive Book objects in the list.
      Returns:
      confirms whether or not the method was successful.

    • size

      public int size()
      The size method gives the length of the BookList.
      Returns:
      gives an integer length of the list.

    • extractAuthList

      public BookList extractAuthList(String aut)
      The extractAuthList method takes an author string, finds all Book entries with the same author, and gives a list of the authors
      Parameters:
      aut - is the author string.
      Returns:
      gives the list of authors.

    • swap

      public boolean swap(long isbn1, long isbn2)
      The swap method takes 2 ISBN values and swaps the books in the list which correspond to the ISBNs given.
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - is the first ISBN value.
      isbn2 - is the second ISBN value.
      Returns:
      confirms whether or not the method was successful.

    • commit

      public void commit()
      The commit method outputs all books in the BookList into the "Update_Books.txt" file.

    • reverseList

      public BookList reverseList()
      The reverseList method reverses the book list.
      Returns:
      gives the reversed list.
